p: Veronimide ( 2): Amorphous white solid; [α] 25 D 26.7 ( c 0.15, MeOH); UV (MeOH) λ max (log ε) 215 (3.70) nm; IR (ATR Diamond) ν max 3308, 2966, 2934, 2878, 2273, 1740, 1670 cm −1; For 1H and 13C NMR data see Table 2; HRESIMS m/ z 249.1211 [M+Na] + (Calcd. for C 11H 18N 2O 3Na, 249.1215). Retention times of the L-FDAA Marfey’s derivatives: L-Ile 49.0 min (D-Ile 53.2 min).
